name: Venny is in trouble
description:
You can play it online on GameJolt

This game was produced less than 72 hours by the Dat Op Games team, we are Brazilian students of game development, this project was created for Ludum Dare Game Jam 40.

Developers team:
Djosef Wytemalhos - Design / Art / Audio / Programmer.
Sabrina Lacerda - Arte / Audio.
Saulo Mendes - Programmer.

Venny is in Trouble it’s an space 2d infinity Shooter which you control Venny, a space pirate girl and must survive the attack of the aliens.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move or WASD.

Left Mouse Button to shoot.

Right mouse button to launch grenade.

PS: Try to reach x100 COMBO!!

We hope you have fun.
